scripts.postinstall: dart pub get && dart pub global activate webdev
scripts.clean: rm -rf build web/js && dart run build_runner clean
scripts.build: pnpm run build:prod && webdev build && rm -rf build/.dart_tool build/node_modules build/package.json build/styles.tw.css build/tailwind.config.js
scripts.infra:preview: cd infra && pulumi stack select prod && pulumi preview
scripts.infra:up: cd infra && pulumi stack select prod && pulumi up --yes && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $(pulumi stack output cloudfrontDistributionId) --paths '/*' --profile=workloads-prod
